xuiProgress
directive in module xui

Description

XUI Progress component.

Usage

as element:
<xui-progress
       [percent="{string}"]
       [allow-cancel="{boolean}"]
       [message="{string}"]
       [help-text="{string}"]
       [show="{boolean}"]
       [show-number="{boolean}"]
       [show-progress="{boolean}"]
       [thin="{boolean}"]
       [stacked="{boolean}"]
       [on-cancel="{expression}"]>
</xui-progress>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
percent
(optional)
string

Value for progress completion.

allow-cancel
(optional)
boolean

Set to true to allow the user to cancel the operation.

message
(optional)
string

Caption for the progress.

help-text
(optional)
string

Additional information displayed below the progress.

show
(optional)
boolean

Determines if the whole component is shown or not.

(default: false)

show-number
(optional)
boolean

Displays numeric progress (ex: 54%).

(default: false)

show-progress
(optional)
boolean

Display the progress bar (ex: ████░░).

(default: false)

thin
(optional)
boolean

Renders progress bar all on one line (space permitting).

(default: false)

stacked
(optional)
boolean

Uncenters marquee.

(default: false)

on-cancel
(optional)
expression

()=>boolean Callback function that is executed when the user has asked to cancel the current operation.

Example

Source
